articles.content:
DENVER (KDVR) For at least the last year and a half, the price of rent for an apartment in Denver has been climbing at an astronomical rate.

articles.content: Nielsen Holdings PLC agreed to sell itself to a group of private-equity firms in a deal that values the media-measurement company at around $10 billion, resurrecting a deal after talks fell apart las… [+206 chars]

articles.author: Anna Wilde Mathews
articles.title: UnitedHealth to Buy Home-Health Firm LHC Group for $5.4 Billion - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The $5.4 billion deal marks the latest foray by a managed-care company into a category said to promise lower costs than hospitals and nursing homes.
articles.content:
UnitedHealth Group Inc. has agreed to buy LHC Group Inc. for about $5.4 billion in cash, in the latest tie-up linking a managed-care company to the home-health business.
